trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> tab group that dynamically displays controls that are only relevant in a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>以動態方式顯示只在特定內容相關的控制項的索引標籤群組。

trans-unit.source: You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 您使用*內容相關索引標籤*顯示群組的只在特定內容相關的命令。

trans-unit.source: Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 內容相關索引標籤群組顯示或隱藏根據指定的準則。

trans-unit.source: For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當偵測到 tablet 輸入時，或圖片工具索引標籤群組可能會顯示選取的映像物件時，可能會顯示 筆跡工具索引標籤群組。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the contextual tab group header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容相關索引標籤群組標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The content of the contextual tab group header.
trans-unit.target: 內容相關索引標籤群組標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format that is used to display the header content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示標頭內容為字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStringFormat property is only used when there is no header template.
trans-unit.target: 只有當沒有標頭範本時，才會使用 HeaderStringFormat 屬性。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The format that is used to display the header content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示標頭內容為字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display the contents of the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>用來顯示標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A template that specifies the visualization of the header.
trans-unit.target: 指定標頭中的視覺效果範本。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display the contents of the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的自訂邏輯<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>用來顯示標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to specify the visualization of the header.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性來指定標頭中的視覺效果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個範本定義，而且想要指定邏輯，選取要使用範本，然後使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性就會忽略<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that provides logic and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>物件，提供邏輯並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property.
trans-unit.target: 舊值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse when a single-click occurs on the contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 內容相關索引標籤群組上按一下時，這個方法會擷取滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: It minimizes or maximizes the window when a double-click occurs.
trans-unit.target: 它會降到最低，或按兩下時，將視窗最大化。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp"></xref> routed event and releases the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp"></xref>路由事件，以及釋放滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This method releases the mouse capture and sends click notifications to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會釋放滑鼠捕捉再傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>通知

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來存取在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Ribbon*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Ribbon*>
